attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
To implement a common sense strategy to give the law the alternate power to protect the UK from extremist haters and organisers.
We need to make the UK a safe and happy place once again. Full of culture and heritage.  Free from these thugs and murderers.
The death penalty will save money not having to hold them in prison. They will only to spread further hate in prison or on their release.
